remarks: Commutative/associative law that swaps the last two factors in a triple product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
muld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addcomd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mul32d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) x. C ) = ( ( A x. C ) x. B ) ) $.
